name: Angular
description: Angular is a framework for building client web-apps.

name: Angular2
description: Angular is a development platform for building mobile and desktop web applications.

description: Use polymer to build structured, encapsulated, client-side web apps with web components.

name: uix
description: Library to build Web User Interfaces in Dart inspired by React.

name: MDL/Dart
description: Material Design Lite for Dart is a framework of components for web developers based on Google's Material Design philosophy.

name: Jaguar
description: A server framework built for speed, simplicity and extensiblity.

name: Angel
description: Angel is a server-side framework designed for full-stack development, with an emphasis on code sharing, scalability, and a low learning curve.

name: Aqueduct
description: Aqueduct is a fully-featured server-side framework, with an ORM, database migration tools, OAuth 2.0 implementation, automatic OpenAPI specification generation and multi-threading support.

name: Redstone
description: Redstone is a server-side, metadata driven micro-framework for Dart.

description: Sinatra inspired web framework to serve static files, handle dynamic requests, websockets and create JSON responses.

name: Express
description: A simple, thin expressjs inspired layer around Dart's primitive HttpServer APIs.

name: Shelf
description: Shelf makes it easy to create and compose web servers and parts of web servers.

name: There are many packages written for Shelf. By convention they start with shelf_
Force
description: A real time web framework, embracing websockets, making communication even better

name: Vane
description: Framework with built-in server runtime environment and middleware system

name: Rikulo Stream

name: StageXL
description: StageXL offers an easy to use and complete API (based on the Flash API) for impressive 2D content like games and other rich applications.

name: DartRocket
description: DartRocket is a HTML5 game framework written in Dart and which uses the StageXL rendering engine.

name: Pixi Dart
description: A port of the pixi.js rendering engine.

name: Ranger
description: A game engine centered around HTML5 Canvas and a scene graph.

description: A port of the original java Universal Tween Engine created by Aurelien Ribbon.

name: Spine Dart
description: An implementation of the Esoteric Software Spine runtime.

name: mustache4dart
description: A simple implementation of Mustache.

name: jaded
description: Port of the excellent Jade view engine.

name: Pub
description: Pub is used to manage packages.

name: Flutter
description: Flutter is a new way to build high-performance, cross-platform mobile apps, allowing you to write applications for Android and iOS.

name: Quiver
description: A set of utility libraries that makes using many libraries easier and more convenient, or adds additional functionality.

name: route_hierarchical

name: Archive
description: A library to encode and decode various archive and compression formats.

description: Parse markdown into HTML on both the client and server.

name: PetitParser
description: PetitParser combines ideas from scannerless parsing, parser combinators, parsing expression grammars and packrat parsers to model grammars and parsers as objects that can be reconfigured dynamically.

description: A lightweight library for parsing, traversing, querying and building XML documents.

name: xmlstream

name: YAML

name: validator.dart

name: Objectory

name: cassowary
description: Implements a subset of the functionality described in the Cassowary paper.  Accepts constraints and updates member variables in an attempt to satisfy the same.
